landing.title: Free, open-source, multidimensional planning poker for agile development teams

builder.title: Multidimensional evaluation matrix editor

realTime.title: Real-time estimation
realTime.description: Vote and estimate tasks in real-time, with our simple and intuitive interface.

inGameVoting.title: In-Game voting creation
inGameVoting.description: The session administrator can create a new vote at any time, regardless of the current state of the vote.

matrixManagement.title: Evaluation matrices management
matrixManagement.description: Manage your evaluation matrices as you wish. Sort, edit, view or delete them, at any time in just a few clicks.
